text: Furileusauria is an extinct clade of abelisaurid dinosaurs only known from South American fossil remains. In addition to the Abelisaurinae, it includes Carnotaurus, Pycnonemosaurus, Quilmesaurus and Viavenator. == See also == * Timeline of ceratosaur research == References == Category:Abelisaurs Category:Late Cretaceous dinosaurs of South America
title: Furileusauria
